I have seen this stacktrace again in Eclipse 3.2, with a slightly modified SharingWard but the same SharingWizardSyncPage. Could this be the same bug ?

Trace :

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed

The page isn't really intended to be used in other wizards. If you are using a modified sharing wizard then I would suggest that you should track down the error yourself and provide a patch if you would like to see this fixed.
